name: Circus Mayhem
description:
Circus Mayhem Made by Winux and Swisspick

Fight, bring loot to the clown statue and recruit allies.

Only you, the Circus Director can stop the madness of the clowns.

  • Fight against multiple enemies
  • Use different weapons to defend yourself
  • Loot items to buy companions

             

  • Your companions will help you out
   
  • Rebuild the Clown statue to calm them down



CONTROLS:

Movement:
WASD

Upgrading
Left Click: +1
Right Click: +10

Shooting:
Mouse: Aiming
Left Click: Shooting

Technical:
Keyboard Key "F" = Fullscreen
1 or 2 = Change Window Size
